data.description:
HUGE LIBRARY WITH BRAND NEW VR CONTENT 
Experience the impact of a holographic presenter; Go to the 360 Degree Bubble to visit places you’ve never been before; View and interact with objects in 3D; Explore images and videos from different views; Host a Q&A, and so much more! 

LET’S GET STARTED! 
Learn more on our website: www.Fectar.com

changelog.change_log:
At Fectar, we believe in continuously enhancing your experience with the magic of Extended Reality (XR). This update may not have many visible changes, but it’s packed with significant improvements under the hood!

- Bug Fixes & Optimizations: We’ve squashed some pesky bugs and fine-tuned our performance. These important fixes ensure a smoother, more reliable, and efficient Fectar experience, so you can create and explore with ease.

- Enhanced Fectar Spatial Engine: For those who delve deeper, you’ll be thrilled to know that we’ve supercharged our Fectar Spatial Engine. This back-end upgrade means faster, more responsive interactions within your XR environments.

- New Particle System for Creators: And here’s something for our advanced creators – we’ve developed our own particle system, enabling stunningly realistic effects like fire and smoke. Your XR creations are about to get a whole lot more lifelike and immersive!

We’re committed to pushing the boundaries of XR and making Fectar the go-to platform for creators and explorers alike. Update now and experience the evolution of Extended Reality!

We kept on improving Fectar. In this update, not just the core of Fectar has been improved, there were also multiple updates throughout the whole app. We hope you enjoy Fectar!
What has changed;
- MeetUp support added
- Settings / MeetUp menu mapped to secondary button (A/X)
- Sound and controller feedback (via vibration) added to UI and Space interaction(s)
- Multiple bugfixes
